{"id":1084793035,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3Â weeks","timestamp":1698343069,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"25 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1084793035/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"72 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\n\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n        ListNode* dummy= new ListNode(-1);\n        ListNode* ans=dummy;\n        int carry=0;\n        ListNode*temp1=l1;\n        ListNode*temp2=l2;\n        while(temp1||temp2||carry){\n            int sum= (temp1?temp1->val:0)+(temp2?temp2->val:0)+carry;\n            carry=sum/10;\n        sum=sum%10;\n            ListNode* Node= new ListNode(sum);\n            dummy->next=Node;\n            dummy=Node;\n            if(temp1)\n            temp1=temp1->next;\n            if(temp2)\n            temp2=temp2->next;\n     \n        }\n        if(temp1){\n                \n            dummy->next=temp1;\n        }\n        if(temp2)dummy->next=temp2;\n        return ans->next;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
